channel.title: Western Regional Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition on WRCCDC
channel.description: Recent content in Western Regional Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition on WRCCDC

item.title: Become a Sponsor
item.description: In order to promote the competition’s success, we need a strong foundation. Sponsorship allows us to maintain the high quality associated with this program. Sponsorship also defrays institution costs, increases participation, and the number of students entering the workforce with this invaluable experience.Â

item.title: Volunteer Information
item.description: If you would like to help Volunteer with WRCCDC, please fill out the form below.

item.title: Regional Finalists
item.description: Congratulations to the teams that made it to the 2020 Regionals!

item.title: Season Participants
item.description: Good luck to all the teams involved in the 2020 WRCCDC Season!

item.title: Acknowledgements
item.description: WRCCDC is brought to you by volunteers, who put in countless hours of work every week. Without their help, this competition would not be possible. We would like to take the opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work and contribution.

item.title: Team Documentation
item.description: Looking for past documents and forms? Look no further.

item.title: Competition Format
item.description: Since the Western Regional of CCDC covers a large region of schools, we host multiple, invitationals each year to give many schools the opportunity to participate in the competition.

item.title: Season Dates
item.description: We are pleased to announce the dates for the WRCCDC 2020 season! We wanted to announce these dates early to make sure people had enough time to plan.

item.title: Competition Rules
item.description: The following are the approved national rules for the 2019-2020 CCDC season. Please refer to the official rules for your specific CCDC event for any local variations. WRCCDC largely follows National CCDC rules, however there are minor differences between this and other regions. Contact organizers@wrccdc.org if you have questions.

item.title: Mission
item.description: The mission of the Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) system is to provide institutions with an information assurance or computer security curriculum a controlled, competitive environment to assess their student’s depth of understanding and operational competency in managing the challenges inherent in protecting a corporate network infrastructure and business information systems.

item.title: History
item.description: On February 27 & 28, 2004, a group of educators, students, government and industry representatives gathered in San Antonio, Texas, to discuss the feasibility and desirability of establishing regular cyber security exercises with a uniform structure for post-secondary level students.

item.description: Congratulations to the teams that made it to the 2019 Regionals!

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you need to contact us by email, feel free to use the form below. We are also available on Twitter, Discord, & Facebook. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: We would like to take the time to thank all of our sponsors for their support. Without their contributions, this competition would not be possible. If you are interested in sponsoring us for next year, our call for Sponsors for the 2020 season is now open! Please see our Sponsorship Information Page for more information.
